00052 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_common_schedule()
00053 {
00054     uvm_phase* pphase;
00055 
00056     if (_uvm_common_schedule == 0)
00057     {
00058         _uvm_common_schedule = new uvm_common_schedule("common");
00059 
00060         pphase = new uvm_build_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00061         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00062 
00063         pphase = new uvm_connect_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00064         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00065 
00066         pphase = new uvm_end_of_elaboration_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00067         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00068 
00069         pphase = new uvm_start_of_simulation_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00070         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00071 
00072         pphase = new uvm_run_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00073         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00074 
00075         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("extract", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00076         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00077 
00078         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("check", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00079         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00080 
00081         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("report", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00082         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00083 
00084         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("final", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_TOP_DOWN);
00085         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00086 
00087         _uvm_common_schedule->set_top_phase("build");
00088         //_uvm_common_schedule->set_top_phase("run");
00089         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("build", "connect");
00090         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("connect", "end_of_elaboration");
00091         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("end_of_elaboration", "start_of_simulation");
00092         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("start_of_simulation", "run");
00093         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("run", "extract");
00094         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("extract", "check");
00095         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("check", "report");
00096         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("report", "final");
00097 
00098     }
00099 
00100     return _uvm_common_schedule;
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_schedule()
00106 {
00107     uvm_phase* pphase;
00108     uvm_phase* preset_phase;
00109     uvm_phase* pshutdown_phase;
00110     uvm_phase* prun_phase;
00111     uvm_common_schedule* pcommon_schedule;
00112 
00113     if (_uvm_schedule == 0)
00114     {
00115         _uvm_schedule = new uvm_common_schedule("uvm");
00116 
00117         preset_phase = new uvm_common_phase("reset", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00118         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(preset_phase);
00119 
00120         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("configure", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00121         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00122 
00123         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("main", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00124         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00125 
00126         pshutdown_phase = new uvm_common_phase("shutdown", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00127         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pshutdown_phase);
00128 
00129         pcommon_schedule = get_uvm_common_schedule();
00130         prun_phase = pcommon_schedule->get_phase("run");
00131 
00132         preset_phase->sync_phase(prun_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_START);
00133         pshutdown_phase->sync_phase(prun_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00134         prun_phase->sync_phase(pshutdown_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00135 
00136         _uvm_schedule->set_top_phase("reset");
00137         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("reset", "configure");
00138         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("configure", "main");
00139         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("main", "shutdown");
00140 
00141     }
00142 
00143     return _uvm_schedule;
00144 
00145 }

00147 
00148 void uvm_common_schedule::init(void)
00149 {
00150     if (_top_phase == NULL)
00151     {
00152         cout << "uvm_common_schedule::init - top phase not set for schedule - " << name() << endl;
00153         exit(1);
00154     }
00155 
00156     _current_phase = _top_phase;
00157     _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START);
00158 
00159 
00160 int num = 5;
00161 
00162 }
00163 
00164 void uvm_common_schedule::execute_build(uvm_component* pcomp)
00165 {
00166     if (_current_phase->get_name()  != "build") 
00167     {
00168         cout << "ERROR:execute_build - first phase is not build" << endl;
00169         exit(1);
00170     }
00171 
00172     _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00173     _current_phase->execute(pcomp);
00174     _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_DONE);
00175     _current_phase = _current_phase->get_next_phase();
00176 
00177     if (_bcontinue)
00178         sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_schedule::start_schedule, this, pcomp));
00179 }
